LanguageData.AF_Robe_Blue.label: Ferian Robe Royal（Blue）
LanguageData.AF_Robe_Blue.description: An extremely luxurious blue royal robe! Put It on and play a cute "King Game" with your Furry Friends!
LanguageData.AF_Robe_Yellow.label: Ferian Robe Royal（Yellow）
LanguageData.AF_Robe_Yellow.description: An extremely luxurious yellow royal robe! Put It on and play a cute "King Game" with your Furry Friends!
